pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Coaxes crops into faster growth, and harvests crops that are mature.$(br)$(l)Magical School:$() $(9)Grace$()$(br)$(l)Mana Cost:$() 3$(br)$(l)Cooldown:$() 0.7 to 0.5 seconds$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/opaline_scepter)Opaline Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/iridescent_scepter)Iridescent Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/lustrous_scepter)Lustrous Scepter$()$(br)$(l)Tier:$() 1
